title: Communication Competency Enhancement Program for ICT-Utilized Instructional Design and Student Support

context.prior_knowledge: Core educational theories and introductory ICT utilization experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance ICT-based instructional design and student support capabilities. Learners complete personalized projects using their digital devices.

learning_goals: The professionalism (COMP) component of communication competence can be analyzed and applied to ICT-integrated instructional design
Structural equation modeling can be utilized to scientifically evaluate ICT utilization strategies in instructional design
Project-based learning can be employed to design ICT-supported systems applicable to real educational settings

resources: Access Rights to ICT Educational Tools
Statistical Analysis Software (SEM - Structural Equation Modeling)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
